long_description: Add comfort and sophistication to your backcountry camp with the GSI Outdoors Micro table. It provides a stable surface for your stove, small buffet or chess board. Strong slats of lightweight aluminum form the table surface; dual-height, folding legs hold the table 6 in. off the ground. Accordion-fold design of the GSI Outdoors Micro table compacts to fit in the included 15 x 3.5 x 3 in. stuff sack. Sturdy design holds up to 20 lbs.
short_description: Add comfort and sophistication to your backcountry camp with the GSI Outdoors Micro table. It provides a stable surface for your stove, small buffet or chess board.
